pages.text: A $(thing)Disjunctive Extraction$() augment allows for an  $(l:mods_thermalexpansion/enervation_dynamo)Enervation Dynamo$() to use enchanted items as fuel. The items are consumed completely. The augment also quintuples (x5) the dynamo's maximum power output, but the dynamo will only accept enchanted items as power source.

pages.title: Energy Calculation
pages.text: The amount of energy generated is calculated as follows:$(p)energyRF = 5000 * ([sum of minimum modified enchantment levels] + (numEnchantments * (numEnchantments + 1) / 2))
